name: cazana
slogan: Vehicle data, valuations and audience for the future of mobility
description:
Cazana provides automotive insights for the future of vehicle ownership. Using big data and predictive analytics, Cazana analyses millions of automotive transactions daily to assess the value and risk associated with every vehicle on the road.

Cazana's systems are used by manufacturers, finance companies, dealerships and insurers globally. Companies use Cazana’s data to provide vehicles to the modern automotive consumer who is in search of mobility, not ownership.

Our small team is growing fast, in-part thanks to our rapid revenue growth and supported by our recent investment by leading VCs Passion Capital and Payman Pouladdej. We’re very keen to create a high-performing culture whilst having fun. We’re fixing some extremely interesting problems that have the potential to completely disrupt the multi-billion pound used car industry and we’re looking for people that are passionate about working to solve interesting problems with the latest technology and agile working practices.

jobs.title: Media Sales Manager
jobs.description:
Are you passionate about classic cars? Are you a brilliant B2B media sales person looking to work for a thriving, fast-paced company?  

This is an ideal time to join a small but highly talented team where you can have a big impact on the success of the company. We recently acquired Car and Classic, Europe’s largest digital classic cars marketplace, with millions of viewers monthly. At Car and Classic, we are a bunch of classic car enthusiasts making the process of buying and selling classic cars easier for consumers, retailers, and manufacturers. We are looking for a commercial, tech-savvy Media Sales Manager to join our team in London.

What you’ll do
You will be playing a hands-on role in leading the implementation and launch of direct sales and driving the company into the next stages of growth. You will be uniquely responsible for building and optimizing existing relationships, identifying new partners and new initiatives for publishers to improve revenues. 

Manage, build and grow lasting partnerships with premium publisher clients and strategic partners in the UK
Drive performance for clients through implementation and consulting, thereby growing media buying solutions and account performance
Fully comprehend client needs/requirements in order to intelligently identify new opportunities and upsell the platform

Requirements
2+ years sales experience within a B2B publishing environment
Have a proven track record of hitting and exceeding media sales targets
High attention to detail, organized and with strong written and conversational skills 
Excellent interpersonal, relationship building skills and the ability to negotiate with top level executives
Self-starter with the will to take initiative, work in a fast-paced environment and be able to continually learn on the job!

Benefits
This role is based in London and pays competitive salary + uncapped OTE
Opportunities to be challenged, grow, and develop in your role - progress is paramount, so you’ll receive the support and guidance you need to help you achieve your career goals
A fun team who eats together, works hard together, and stays together

jobs.title: Business Development Executive
jobs.description:
Are you passionate about cars? Do you understand the automotive sector and especially the dealership? Are you a brilliant sales person looking to work for a thriving, fast-paced company?  

This is an ideal time to join a small but highly talented team where you can have a big impact on the success of the company. Cazana is radically changing the automotive industry with innovative new data sets that allow manufacturers and dealers to trade more effectively with digitally enabled consumers. We are looking for a commercial, tech-savvy sales executive to join our team in London.

What you’ll do
You will be playing a hands-on role in the conversion of sales opportunities, responsible for your own pipeline including nurturing, developing and closing leads. You will join the business's other business development executives in growing our sales within the dealer and motor engineer sectors.

You will need a consultative sales approach to help our customers understand the benefits of Cazana's data to their businesses.

Fully comprehend client needs/requirements in order to intelligently identify new opportunities and upsell the platform

Requirements
2+ years sales experience within a B2B sales environment, ideally automotive and ideally SaaS.
Have a proven track record of hitting and exceeding SaaS sales targets
High attention to detail, organized and with strong written and conversational skills 
Excellent interpersonal, relationship building skills and the ability to negotiate with top level executives
Self-starter with the will to take initiative, work in a fast-paced environment and be able to continually learn on the job!

Benefits
This role is based in London and pays competitive salary + uncapped OTE
Opportunities to be challenged, grow, and develop in your role - progress is paramount, so you’ll receive the support and guidance you need to help you achieve your career goals
A fun team who eats together, works hard together, and stays together
